short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays alt text of images as overlays when hovering over them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to display alt text, conveniently as an overlay on images within any webpage. No need to inspect element or have a third-party screen reader do the work for you. Turn on the extension and view alt text as a simple overlay.
